item.title: 👍Cynthia Stewart - League of Women Voters of WA
item.description: Cynthia Stewart signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent League of Women Voters of WA.

item.description: Matt Miller signed up to testify Other. They are signed up to represent Puget Sound Energy. They are a registered lobbyist.
